#tfimport-terraform import google_compute_instance.vm_template  __project__/${var.zone}/${var.name}
resource "google_compute_instance" "vm_template" {
  provider = google-beta

  name = "${var.name}"
  zone = "${var.zone}"
  machine_type = "${var.machineType}"
  boot_disk {
    device_name = "${var.deviceName}"
    auto_delete = "${var.autoDelete}"
    initialize_params {
      image = "${var.sourceImage}"
    }
  }
  network_interface {
    network = "${var.network}"
    access_config {
    }
  }
}
